DOC.brief_summary: The present study aim analyze influence passive stretching strength train flexibility hamstring people work
DOC.detailed_description: Question : Does passive stretch strength training effect flexibility hamstring people work ? Design : Intervention study human Participants : 40 healthy student volunteer , range age 18 35 year old , work . Intervention : The Wells bench use assess flexibility hamstring muscle . In test , person sits mat , sole foot maintain contact box . The top box indicator mark centimeter use measure flexibility far person push indicator without bend leg . The knee seat person extend hip flexed . The subject ask take deep breath , exhalation , flex trunk forward upper limb extend . The upper limb support bench 23 cm long align tape measure bench . During flexion trunk , right hand place leave tips finger touch indicator top , move forward far possible .
DOC.criteria: The healthy student volunteer work gym 115 month activity range age 18 35 year Volunteers history chronic disease diagnose /or musculoskeletal injury .
